#This file is autogenerated! Don't modify it directly!!!
arabic_greenland_area_scripted_country_name = { #Al-Arḍ al-ẖaḍrā, translation
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:greenland_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_quebec_area_scripted_country_name = { #Kībik
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:quebec_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:upper_missouri_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_red_river_area_scripted_country_name = { #An-Nahr Al-Aḥmar, translation
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:red_river_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_mexihko_area_scripted_country_name = { #Mašīʾkū, invented from Nahuatl
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:mexihko_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }

            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}

    	# regular old country trigger

    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}

arabic_xilotepec_area_scripted_country_name = { #Kuwānaš Wātū, invented from Purepecha
    	# regular old country trigger

            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}

arabic_xalisco_area_scripted_country_name = { #Wādī al-Ḥajārah, Taken from the Arabic etymology of Guadalajara
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass

    		OR = {
    			area = area:xalisco_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}

arabic_baja_area_scripted_country_name = { #Dār al-ẖalīfah as-suflā, invented based on the theory that the name California is related to caliph
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:baja_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_alaxsxaq_area_scripted_country_name = { #Al-Aẖsaq, invented based on Aleut alaxsxaq

            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}

    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language

arabic_great_basin_area_scripted_country_name = { #Al-Ḥawḍ al-ʿaẓīm, actual name
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language

					overlord ?= {

					}
    		}
    	}

    		}
    	}

arabic_rockies_area_scripted_country_name = { #Al-Jibāl aṣ-ṣaẖriyyah, actual name/translation
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass

    		OR = {
    			area = area:rockies_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_hawaii_area_scripted_country_name = { #Juzur al-Hawāʾ, interpreted original word as adjective, backformed country
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:hawaii_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	# regular old country trigger

            NOT = {

arabic_paraiba_area_scripted_country_name = { #Biʾr Ībah, invented from Tupi, based on misidentification with Biʾr ("well")
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:paraiba_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_bahia_area_scripted_country_name = { #Al-H̱alīj, translation for "bay" (same word as "gulf")
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:bahia_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_bogota_area_scripted_country_name = { #Abū Qiṭāʿ, invented using possessor particle "abu"
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language

					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass

    		OR = {
    			area = area:bogota_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_andes_area_scripted_country_name = { #Al-Andah, modern name
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:andes_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	# regular old country trigger

            NOT = {

arabic_qullaw_area_scripted_country_name = { #Ṣaʿīd Birū, translation of "Upper Peru"
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {

					}
    		}
    	}

    		}
    	}

    	}

arabic_la_plata_area_scripted_country_name = { #Bilād al-Fiḍḍah, ("Country of Silver")
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:la_plata_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_moqoit_area_scripted_country_name = { #Muqayṭ
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:moqoit_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_cordoba_de_tucuman_area_scripted_country_name = { #Qurṭubah
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:cordoba_de_tucuman_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_boiaca_area_scripted_country_name = { #Abū Yakā, invented using possessor particle "abu"
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:boiaca_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
arabic_sinu_area_scripted_country_name = { #Qarṭāj, Arabic name for "Carthage"
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:arabic_language
					culture.language = language:arabic_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:arabic_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:arabic_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:sinu_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
